field_upgrades.name: Aether Shroud
field_upgrades.description: Phase into the Dark Aether and become temporarily hidden from enemy detection.

major_augments.title: Burst Dash
major_augments.description: Warp forward a short distance, killing all normal enemies in your path.

major_augments.title: Void Sheat
major_augments.description: Swap to your dedicated melee weapon as it's imbued with Dark Aether energy. Kills allow you to stay in Aether Shroud for longer.

minor_augments.title: Instant Reload
minor_augments.description: Activation instantly reloads your currently held weapon.

minor_augments.title: Extension
minor_augments.description: Aether Shroud duration is significantly increased.

field_upgrades.name: Dark Flare
field_upgrades.description: Phase into the Dark Aether and become temporarily hidden from enemy detection.

major_augments.title: Supernova
major_augments.description: The beam is replaced with a sphere that damages nearby enemies as it travels. The ball detonates at the end of Dark Flare's duration.

major_augments.title: Dark Pact
major_augments.description: Beam heals and revives other players on contact.

minor_augments.title: Broad Beam
minor_augments.description: Significantly increase the size of the beam.

minor_augments.title: Heavy Shadow
minor_augments.description: The beam slows enemies on contact.

field_upgrades.name: Frenzied Guard
field_upgrades.description: Repair armor to full and force all enemies in the area to temporarily target you. Armor takes all damage during this time.

major_augments.title: Phalanx
major_augments.description: Teammates can also repair armor from kills while near you.

major_augments.title: Retribution
major_augments.description: Trigger an explosion on activation. Normal enemies that melee the player are damaged and knocked down.

major_augments.title: Frenzy Fire
major_augments.description: While Frenzied, use ammo from stock.

minor_augments.title: Rally
minor_augments.description: On activation, repair all nearby teammate's armor to full.

major_augments.title: Resilience
major_augments.description: All affected players have their health regeneration delay reduced and their rate of healing increased temporarily.

major_augments.title: Enduring Radiance
major_augments.description: The beams and their healing effects persist for a short time after leaving the area of effect.

major_augments.title: Persistence
major_augments.description: Revived players keep all Perks on their bleed-out bar.

minor_augments.title: Inner Strenght
minor_augments.description: Affected player damage is slightly increased for a short time.

minor_augments.title: Protection
minor_augments.description: Healed players have damage slightly mitigated for a short time.

minor_augments.title: Stoic Presence
minor_augments.description: On activation, Special and Elite enemies are stunned while normal enemies are knocked down.

field_upgrades.name: Energy Mine
field_upgrades.description: Create a mine of pure energy that detonates three times, dealing lethal electric damage.

major_augments.title: Scatter
major_augments.description: The Energy Mine will split into three mines that scatter and detonate one time each.

major_augments.title: Turret
major_augments.description: Instead of a mine, deploy a turret that shoots at the nearest enemy.

major_augments.title: Carousel
major_augments.description: Three Energy Mines will float around you, detonating when an enemy is nearby.

minor_augments.title: Frequency Boost
minor_augments.description: Increase detonation count and duration of Energy Mine.

minor_augments.title: Siren
minor_augments.description: Energy mine now attracts nearby normal enemies for a short time.

field_upgrades.name: Tesla Storm
field_upgrades.description: For 10 seconds, lightning connects to other players, stunning and damaging normal enemies.

major_augments.title: Transformer
major_augments.description: The fieldâ€™s damage is increased by the number of allies that are connected.

major_augments.title: Shockwave
major_augments.description: On activation, stun and damage all nearby enemies.

major_augments.title: Static Discharge
major_augments.description: On activation, create a lethal surge of electricity around you.

minor_augments.title: Power Grid
minor_augments.description: Increase the range the electric tether can connect to allies.

minor_augments.title: Overclocked
minor_augments.description: Your movement speed is increased during Tesla Storm.
